english: A clobbering now would probably make them more likely to turn to an electable candidate in 2008
chinese: 一个痛击现在或许将会使他们更可能在2008年转向一个有候选资格的候选人。

english: Other chelsea players to have been shortlisted in the past are petr cech , gianfranco zola twice , jimmy floyd hasselbaink and ruud gullit
chinese: 在过去获得候选资格的其它切尔西队员有：切赫、佐拉各两次，哈塞尔巴因克和古力特。
候选资格造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法
